name: GOOM
description:
Use your Goo-Guns to annihilate enemies with acids and bases.

Make sure to keep your pH BALANCED or you'll start to take heavy damage!

Created for ScoreSpace #8

            Use Q and E to swap between your Acid and Base guns

            Hold the right mouse button for a tighter spread

           Basic enemies only take damage from Acid weapons             Standing in Acid/Base puddles effect your PH
            This eventually causes damage             Hold SHIFT to move quickly, you can do this in air too             Hold SPACE to jump crazy distances             Use ramps to move around quickly             Collect Health pickups to heal

Created with: (Unity, ProBuilder, UFPS, Paint.net, SFXR, Soundtrap, Audacity)

Fonts: (Queen of Camelot, AmazDoom, Monoid)

This game is graphically intense, you may need a beefy computer :)
